Topic.Title: How do I change the background color?

Posts.EditableText: Hey guys, I'm creating a game with Squiffy directly in the browser. Do you know how to change the background color to black? I'm also looking to change the text to white.
Posts.HTML: Hey guys, I'm creating a game with Squiffy directly in the browser. Do you know how to change the background color to black? I'm also looking to change the text to white.

Behind the title directive you can put this lines with tab or four spaces

$('#output').css('background-color', 'black');
$('#output').css('color', 'white');

When you publish de game change the values of #output for body.

Posts.EditableText: I'm not sure how to change the output, or what to change it to.
